attributes.action: Review the 2012 Increase In Rail Fares
attributes.additional_details:
A person can travel by Train from London to Birmingham and return within one month for £25 (115.1 miles). But a person has to pay £26.30 for the same ticket type from Guildford to Portsmouth Harbour (44 miles).

Rail Travel Cost Source: nationalrail.co.uk
Rail Mileage Source: travelfootprint.org

The goverment must review and accordingly take action against the significant cost in Rail Travel on certain routes.
